author: Slidebean
description:
Meet Moflin the AI pet that doesn’t poop. 💩

Casio just launched Moflin, a fluffy AI companion that “learns your emotions” with over 4 million emotional states.
It’s cute, until you remember it’s basically a Furby with Wi-Fi and feelings. 

👉Hear the full breakdown on: https://vist.ly/4bp74
title: Casio launches Moflin, the AI powered emotional pet.

author: Slidebean
description:
Anthropic develops method to prevent AI from generating nuclear weapon instructions

To stop people from asking AI how to build a nuclear bomb, Anthropic trained it to recognize bomb-making questions — which means it kinda had to learn the recipe first.
So yeah… AI safety is getting weird.

👉Hear the full breakdown on: https://vist.ly/4bnac
title: AI safety, but make it dangerous.

author: Slidebean
description:
A Lithuanian startup just launched what they call the first industrial AI system that recognizes and sorts used LEGO bricks, raising $3M to scale the idea.

Here’s how it works:
👉 You ship your mixed-up LEGOs.
👉 AI scans, identifies, and sorts every piece.
👉 You get a perfectly organized, pre-sorted LEGO set back.

Isn’t the point of LEGO to get creative, not outsource imagination to AI?

At what point does “innovation” start to kill play?
👉Hear the full breakdown on: https://vist.ly/4bn3t
title: AI Can Sort Your Used LEGOs Now But Should It?
